Darkfate::

Darkfate found the passwords that will help him to free his allies 
and do severalthings against the TRainers...

The BLackFortress's leader turned off the shield where his allies 
were, he alsos started to turnet off the base's defences and he 
started to Download a virus that would destroy all Trainers Data's 
base.

While he did that he said to all Predacons troops "Be ready to 
attack!!!"

Then Darkfate opened an secret Frecuency to Killfest, Drillbit and 
Destrons "Be ready... It's almost done"
